content: How do I order the licence key?
replyContent: Thank you very much for your positive rating! For ordering the licence key, just have a look to our internet page www.eMax-Tuning.com and send an email to info@eMax-Tuning.com, then we will send you detailed information to the necessary steps.

content: Fantastic piece of software that has allowed me to fine tune torque for the various power modes as well as being able to customise various other aspects of the motor behaviour. Licence key came through very quickly. I had several questions which were replied to and resolved by the team very quickly. Excellent software that is easy to use, with excellent after care support and assistance as well as excellent communication. Worth every penny. Thank you Markus and the eMax team.
replyContent: We are very happy if you are happy;-) Thank you very much for this great rating. We wish you an enjoyable, healthy and happy New Year! * * * Best regards from the eMax - team * * *

content: This apps really works! Managed to speed up to 40kmh after getting the key license software from EMAX. The team are very keen answering my pesky questions lol and they managed to answer all with professional feedback, hats off to the EMAX team. Thank you for making my riding more enjoyable.
replyContent: Thanks a lot too for your very nice 5 star rating! We are extremely happy if you are happy with your STePS bike, because we are passionate and daily STePS bikers too;-) Merry XMas from the eMax - team

Would you be treated publically that way too? So, please get in touch with us via email info@eMax-Tuning.com and give us a chance to help you speeding up your bike & we promise it¬¥ll work!

content: Wow! What a fantastic company!! The app works brilliantly. I had problems with my bike not powering up after a wet ride, I contacted these guys for advise, all I can say is there customer service is impeccable. They really went above and beyond to help me out. Sending me diagrams, explaining how to fix the issue! My bike is now up and running again thanks to the professional advise and service these guys have given me. I have also gained some knowledge of how to fix a Shimano motor!! üëçüòÅ
replyContent: Thank you very much for your perfect rating! It was a pleasure for us to help you becoming the expert of your bike;-) We think that we know the Shimano system quite well and we are happy if we can share our knowledge and make STEPS bikers a smile in their face. That is very rewarding for us and a perfect win-win situation. BR & Have a great day;-)

content: It does not connect to E8000 shimano engine. It does not find bike. And displays connection error on bike display.
replyContent: PLEASE write an email to info@eMax-Tuning.com and we will help you! We have documents which will help when there are initial connection problems. We like to help you but we have no chance to help you if you do not contact us - that is not fair... So please contact us and then we will solve the problem and then hopefully you will change the rating.

content: Works well and easy to use. Support is very fast and helpful. Thank you so much Markus. Happy customer here!
Excellent communication, quick delivery of license key, best of all the changes this app enables makes my e MTB even better.
Fantastic App and amazing service... thanks so much Markus... üöµ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è..........

Base application functionality was excellent. Full licence application also worked, but depending on firmware you have on your motor there is some limitations. Also there is possibility to downgrade motor firmware version and then application will have full functionality. Even with limited functionality I can recommend this application. eMax provided fast and excellent support and answered all my questions.

Took me 4 attempts to connect via bluetooth.. so don't give up to fast. The only reason I wanted this app was to De-tune the motor to get less assistance and more km's. This app allowed me to do that and I'm very happy with the bikes assistance now.

I had no problem connecting the app to the bike via bluetooth, it connects really fast. Adjusting the motor performance settings is easy. I bought the license key and with that its also easy to set the bike speed at 32 km/hour with correct speed indication and then even faster when tweaking the wheel circumference but with incorrect speed indication (motor firmware 4.7.1). All was and is easy. I am happy with these possibilities to tweak my emtb.
Didn't get access to the settings that matterrd
replyContent:
We think it is very unfair to leave such a bad rating without even contacting us before and give us a chance to help you.
It is clearly described in the app info that you need a valid licence key for modifying max. speed!
It is quite easy to get in contact with us. 
We like to help users 7 days a week!
We try our very best in service and quality..
